constraints.name: frequency_bound
constraints.description: 序列中每个元素的出现次数恰好为 α

constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 对于任意两个相同的元素 a[i] 和 a[j] (i < j)，在 i 和 j 之间的所有元素都大于等于 a[i]
constraints.formal: ∀i, j, a[i] = a[j] ∧ i < j → ∀k, i < k < j, a[k] ≥ a[i]

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 目标序列必须包含给定的子序列 P
constraints.formal: P 是 a 的子序列

constraints.name: count_inversions
constraints.description: 序列中恰好有 m 个位置满足 a[i] > a[i+1]
